description:
Salad turns downtime into downloads. Run Salad whenever you're away from the keys to score games, gift cards, subscriptions, DLC, and more at the Salad Storefront.


Update to version 1.9.10:
- Updates to improve container workload stability and status reporting.
- Updates support URLs.
Windows 10 and 11: Salad-1.9.10.exe
SHA-256: 4ED7EC419C18E21376324C57DC331EAB84783ED2F160DC6D398D171FFDFC7A02
SHA-1: 1589CF36EA1A385E9E5D5CD94CBCB30B352ADD9D
Errors? Warnings? Concerns? Questions? We understand. Read our [blog post on anti-virus and cryptocurrency miners](https://support.salad.com/article/135-getting-started-with-salad-the-basics and check out our [anti-virus configuration guides](https://support.salad.com/category/971-antivirus.
